title: OUTSOURCING OF DRIVERS/MECHANICS – INVITATION TO TENDER (Department of Petroleum Resources of Nigeria)
text: ( Source : Department of Petroleum Resources of Nigeria ) Department of Petroleum Resources ( DPR ) intends to outsource its Drivers/Mechanics services to enhance its logistics operations. Applications are therefore invited from reputable and
